name: Fuel Rampage
description:
This is the game I made for LD49. The theme was unstable and the game is based around the unstable fuel crisis currently going on within england at the moment

How to Play

Drive around the city collecting the randomly appearing fuel cans. Occasionally a fuel tanker full of fuel will pass through smash as many cans off the tanker as you can before it leave but don't destroy your car 

Mobile

Use the left and right buttons on screen to steer. Press the Boost button once to begin boosting and press it a second time when you want to end your boost

Gamepad

Use the left analog stick to steer left and right to steer and use A too boost

Keyboard

Use A or D to steer and use Space too boost
